title: Usefulness of the addition of metformin to insulin in pediatric patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus
abstract: Background : The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of metformin in addition to insulin therapy in adolescents and young adults with type 1 diabetes mellitus.
